meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Libby Hunt Colby Taylor Blair Moorhead Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7442.

td.p: Libby Hunt, a retired consultant from Dallas, Texas
Colby Taylor, an assistant professor of psychology from Olive Branch, Mississippi
Blair Moorhead, a social worker from Arlington, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,402)

tr.td: "ROLL" CALL
ENTERTAINMENT UNDER THE SEA
NEW WORDS IN THE 1600s
THE CIVIL WAR
WE PREDICT YOUR HOROSCOPE
WHERE'S THAT OPERA HOUSE?
(Alex: You name the city for us.)

tr.td: As a noun it's a big wad of cash; as a verb, it means to finance a business venture
